Description:  Apple IIc Plus Computer, In Original Box
Dimensions:  Approximately 14.5" x 16" in box
Condition:  GOOD. The item looks to be in decent shape and comes in the original (but opened) box. Please see photos for details. This item has NOT been tested in any way.

DUE TO THE LARGE SIZE OF THIS ITEM, THE WEIGHT OF THE PACKAGE HAS BEEN CALCULATED DIMENSIONALLY BY THE SHIPPER - THIS IS MORE THAN THE ACTUAL WEIGHT OF THE ITEM.


NOTE:  Unless explicitly stated otherwise, ALL ITEMS ARE USED AND WE DO NOT GUARANTEE CONDITION IN ANY WAY! This item is sold as is. If you have any questions regarding this item, please open a customer service ticket BEFORE bidding. This item is available for pick-up at our North Versailles location Monday-Friday 9:00am-3:00pm.

View other items for sale by this seller

Customer Service:

Currently we handle all customer related issues via the Shopgoodwill customer service link. We do our best to answer all questions in a timely manner Monday through Friday, 8am to 4:00pm, EST. We do not handle customer service issues on weekends or any major holidays.

Payment:

Auctions are easily and securely paid online with a major credit card. We cannot accept cash, checks or money orders. At this time, we are not accepting Paypal as a payment option.

Returns:

All merchandise is sold "As Is." Should you receive an item that is either damaged or does not match the listing description, please contact us via the customer service help desk on Shopgoodwill. We will review all return requests. In the case of damaged items, we will file a claim on your behalf with either USPS or UPS. We do not refund incurred shipping costs for item returns.

Shipping:

Currently we ship items via USPS or UPS. Orders paid for over the weekend will not be seen until Monday morning. Orders paid for after 3pm EST will not be printed until the following morning during business hours. Shipping costs for UPS are calculated by weight and distance. All items shipped via UPS have a dimensional weight. Shipping costs for USPS are either a posted flat-rate or calculated by weight and distance. Large items have a dimensional weight. All jewelry items ship in a flat-rate box which includes $50.00 insurance at no additional charge to the customer. All items that total $100 or more receive additional insurance complimentary to the customer. Each order that totals $1,000 or more will be shipping via registered mail complimentary to the customer. Items typically ship within 1-5 business days after payment is made.

All items have a $2.50 handling fee regardless of whether or not you combine multiple items together.

Combined Shipping:

Items may be combined to save on shipping charges if they close within 5 days of each other and are safe to ship in one box. Up to 5 jewelry items may be combined. Once paid for, items may not be combined. We reserve the right to deny combination of items. All items will be shipped as listed and will not be disassembled for any reason.

Local Pick Up Services:

We offer pick-up appointments Monday - Friday, 9am to 3pm, EST. 24 hour notice is required and payment must be made online prior to pick up. We do not accept payment at the time of pick-up and will not accept cash, check or money orders of any kind. When making a payment please ensure you select the "pick-up" option, or the order may be shipped to you. Items not picked up within 14 days of the end of the auction will no longer be available, even if paid for. Upon pick-up, you will notice that all merchandise purchased will be packaged just as if you had paid for shipping. No merchandise is to be opened or inspected upon pick-up. If the item is grossly distorted from it's description, please submit a ticket through the Shopgoodwill help desk within 7 days of opening and viewing the item(s) you purchased. No assistance is available for loading and securing merchandise in or on the customer's vehicle. Customer has the sole responsibility for loading and securing merchandise. We are located at 294 Lincoln Highway, North Versailles, PA 15137. We do not permit 3rd parties to pick up items from this location. All items must be picked up by the primary account holder only.

We are closed on weekends and all major holidays.

Return Policy: Merchandise is sold As Is. Returns will only be accepted with prior authorization and under the terms stated in this Return Policy. If you have questions regarding the quality or authenticity of this item please contact Goodwill of Southwestern Pennsylvania prior to placing your bid. Items may be returned within seven (7) days of receipt if the merchandise was damaged during shipping or if there was a major distortion in the description. Returns will not be accepted without prior authorization. PLEASE NOTE THAT WE DO NOT REFUND SHIPPING AND HANDLING CHARGES. Items selected for pick up from the seller, must be picked up within thirty (30) days from close of auction. Items not picked up from seller within thirty (30) days from close of auction will be resold with no further notice.
